mapper.insert: insert into businessusers (buId, buPw, buNum, buName, buEmail, buTel) values (#{buId}, #{buPw}, #{buNum}, #{buName}, #{buEmail}, #{buTel})

insert into restaurants (restId, restName, restTel, restAddr, restDiscription, restRuntime, restCategory, restConvenience, restExterior, restInterior) values (#{restId}, #{restName}, #{restTel}, #{restAddr}, #{restDiscription}, #{restRuntime}, #{restCategory}, #{restConvenience}, #{restExterior}, #{restInterior})
